conbody.p: is a certified distribution of the Cloud Foundry Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) software. You can run from the command line to deploy a private or public PaaS.

uses containers for bundling all major functions, for representing roles, and for providing simple update and upgrade workflows. It also uses Consul for centralized configuration storage that runs on each host VM.

ul.li: If you have worked with Cloud Foundry, you can work in a familiar environment that uses Terraform, a service management command-line tool.
If you have worked with the HP Helion Development Platform, you can work in a familiar environment that uses gato, a new command-line administration utility.
